prefix-list.name: LOCAL-FXP0
prefix-list.apply-path: interfaces fxp0 unit <*> family inet address <*>

prefix-list.name: LOOPBACKS
prefix-list.apply-path: interfaces lo0 unit 0 family inet address <*>
